analyzed: devam va yakkham atha vā manussa
gaccha iva tvam yakkha mahā anubhāva

original: Mā taṁ ratiṁ jīyi tuvaṁ sucimhite,
analyzed: mā tam ratim jīyi tuvam sucimhite
āyu ca vaṇṇo ca manussa loke
tena iva vaṇṇena dhanam pi tuyha

original: Dibbo ca vaṇṇo vipulā ca bhogā”.
analyzed: dibbaḥ ca vaṇṇaḥ vipulā ca bhogā
ettha ṭṭhitaḥ para lokam na bhāye
tat ca api jahati a vīta rāgaḥ

original: Mātā ca pitā ca bhātaro ca,
analyzed: mātā ca pitā ca bhātaro ca
bhariyā yā api dhanena hoti kītā
